price: Kuma Allah Ya buga wani misãli dõmin waɗanda suka yi ĩmãni; matar Fir'auna,* sa'ad da ta ce "Ya Ubangiji! Ka gina mini wani gida a wurin Ka a cikin Aljanna. Kuma Ka tsĩrar da ni daga Fir'auna da aikinsa. Kuma Ka tsĩrar da ni daga mutãnen nan azzãlumai."
arabic: وَضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱمۡرَأَتَ فِرۡعَوۡنَ إِذۡ قَالَتۡ رَبِّ ٱبۡنِ لِي عِندَكَ بَيۡتٗا فِي ٱلۡجَنَّةِ وَنَجِّنِي مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَعَمَلِهِۦ وَنَجِّنِي مِنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: * Wannan yanã nũna cewa kusantar kãfiri bã zai cũci mũminai ba. Sai dai Allah Yã hana aure a tsakãnin Musulma da kãfiri.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: waḍaraba al-lahu mathalan lilladhīna āmanū im'ra-ata fir'ʿawna idh qālat rabbi ib'ni lī ʿindaka baytan fī al-janati wanajjinī min fir'ʿawna waʿamalihi wanajjinī mina al-qawmi al-ẓālimīna
